resources.string: The maximum value of the entered number has been reached
Result generated %% in %%, within the specified range from %% to %% %%
The result cannot be generated. Edit the exceptions.
via a service provided by the Australian National University
An exception was thrown by %% in %%,

Random numbers are generated in real time in the laboratory of the Australian National University by measuring the quantum fluctuations of the vacuum. This service will be used in case of a working connection to the network.
